title: 3.4 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a Python program to draw a triangle using the turtle library. Each time the user presses the letter X on the keyboard, the size of the triangle should increase by 10%. When the user presses the letter Y on the keyboard, the size of the triangle should reduce by 10%.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
